channel.title: [Help]Gfx, Emotes, Animation models! [REP]
channel.description:
I need help, i've found a-load of models that involve graphics, emotions, animations etc. I want to add them to my client but i don't know which code/ints, or which file to add them into. I know that class5.java is for NPC's and class8.java is for items. I can't seem to find which file is for gfx, emotes, or animations.
Please help!

item.title: [Help]Gfx, Emotes, Animation models! [REP]
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

Emotions have not been found out how to work yet. But follow what Encouragin said.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Gfx, Emotes, Animation models! [REP]
item.dc:creator: @Encouragin Encouragin
item.description:
@Encouragin wrote:

Anims: Animation.java (Refactored)

Anims: Idfk (Unfactored)

Gfx: SpotAnim.java (Refactored)

Gfx: Class23.java (Unfactored)

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Gfx, Emotes, Animation models! [REP]

item.description:

Use that tut to help you make more gfxes.
